Bretton Woods Fell Race

October 3, 2015

9:00am

Bretton Woods Ski Area 99 Ski Area Road Bretton Woods, New Hampshire

Photo Courtesy of Gianina Lindsey

"Bretton Woods is one of my favorite races of all time. You never know what's going to happen, or when it's going to happen, but SOMETHINGS going to happen..."

-Douglas Grey

RACE acidotic and Win!

We've partnered with Suunto to bring you a very special year long promotion. Every acidotic RACING event you do automatically enters you in a drawing to win a Suunto Ambit3 which we will randomly draw after the last race on our schedule. The more you race with us, the better your chances of winning. So come on out and RACE acidotic and win!
